title: Poppy needs some love..... still waiting for a rework :3
body:
I created this ever since I started playing Poppy Jungle and when my midlane asks for blue. exactly how I feel.
I dedicate this for valentines day as well as Poppy rework awareness, she's not the most popular champion in the pool but one I very much enjoy playing and would love to see a rework of soon~

Art done by me ~
not my best work but good enough~

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Poppy is actually on the list for some love! As noted on the [Champion Update page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule), she's scheduled for a gameplay and visual update! You can grab a bit more info [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/dev-blog-champion-updates)!
This scares me more than you can imagine.

So far we know that they plan on keeping her Dive happy/Dash-n-smash play style in some way shape or form, and that her E is going to stay largely unchanged outside of general tuning.

I'm also anxious about it, but I'm hopeful that they pull off a really good one, cuz Poppy deserves the best!
